data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cóndor-Luján, B., Klautau, M. (2016): Nicola gen. nov. with redescription of Nicola tetela (Borojevic & Peixinho, 1976) (Porifera: Calcarea: Calcinea: Clathrinida). Zootaxa 4103 (3): 230-238, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.3.2
